tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of the workshop.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare your OCI tenant
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to set up your OCI tenant in order to have your Unique Security Experience.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Get delighted with your first Unique Security Experience
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to automate the journey to security by using the OCI Security application that will make you have that Unique Security Experience.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Automatic activation of Cloud Guard
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to use your Security Dashboard to activate Cloud Guard.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
